attributes.action: Make a cinema in Ealing Broadway
attributes.background: Ealing Broadway is the home of cinema. It has Ealing Studios and two film universities; Met Film School and University of West London. The nearest cinema for the cinema goers is Hammersmith. Why shouldn't the film students have a cinema in Ealing, where they live? No hassle and no money to get there

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The decision to locate a cinema in Ealing Broadway would be a decision for cinema operators and not the UK Government and Parliament as a whole.
